sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' export default function ProductScreen({match}) { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const fetchProducts = async () => { const {data} = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/products/${match.params.id}`) console.log(data); setProduct(data) } fetchProducts() }, []); return (
Go Back

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}

  • Description: {product.description}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Status: {product.countInStock > 0? "In Stock": "Out of Stock"}
) }
